ItemGroupDef.Name: ADVS
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per vital sign measurement per time point per visit per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: ADAE
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: one record per subject per each AE recorded in SDTM AE domain

Description.TranslatedText: Study Day of Start of Adverse Event
Study Day of End of Adverse Event
Reported Term for the Adverse Event
Numeric analysis value described by PARAM
Character analysis value described by PARAM

If AE.AEREL is equal to NOT RELATED or UNLIKELY RELATED then RELGR1=Not Related Else if AE.AEREL is equal to POSSIBLY RELATED or PROBABLY RELATED or DEFINITELY RELATED or Causality is missing then RELGR1=Related
Map RELGR1 to RELGR1N in the following manner: ‘Not Related’ = 0 ‘Related’ = 1
Map ASEV to ASEVN in the following manner: Mild = 1, Moderate = 2, Severe = 3
refer to SAP, Section 7.1 - if not pooled then SITEGR1=SITEID. If pooled, SITEGR1 will be 900
Map the SDTM VSTESTCDs to PARAMCDs.
Compute the Baseline Flag from AVISIT.
Screen Failures are excluded since they are not needed for this study analysis
Numeric code for TRT01P which corresponds to the randomized dose
TRT01A=TRT01P, i.e., no difference between actual and randomized treatment in this study.
Numeric code for TRT01A which corresponds to the randomized dose
AGEGR1 = 1 if AGE <65. AGEGR1 = 2 if AGE 65-80. AGEGR1 = 3 if AGE >80.
